get.description: The delivery's JSON request sent to the endpoint

409.description: `webhookdelivery-pruned`: This webhook delivery has been pruned, so it can't be redelivered.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store id

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: The webhook id

parameters.name: deliveryId
parameters.description: The id of the delivery

200.description: The new delivery id being broadcasted. (Broadcast happen asynchronously with this call)

409.description: `webhookdelivery-pruned`: This webhook delivery has been pruned, so it can't be redelivered.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the delivery got broadcasted

httpCode.description: HTTP code received by the remote service, if any.

errorMessage.description: User friendly error message, if any.

status.description: Whether the delivery failed or not (possible values are: `Failed`, `HttpError`, `HttpSuccess`)

secret.description: Must be used by the callback receiver to ensure the delivery comes from BTCPay Server. BTCPay Server includes the `BTCPay-Sig` HTTP header, whose format is `sha256=HMAC256(UTF8(webhook's secret), body)`. The pattern to authenticate the webhook is similar to [how to secure webhooks in Github](https://docs.github.com/webhooks/securing/). If left out, null, or empty, the secret will be auto-generated.

Must be used by the callback receiver to ensure the delivery comes from BTCPay Server. BTCPay Server includes the `BTCPay-Sig` HTTP header, whose format is `sha256=HMAC256(UTF8(webhook's secret), body)`. The pattern to authenticate the webhook is similar to [how to secure webhooks in Github](https://docs.github.com/webhooks/securing/). Value of the auto-generated or custom secret.

Must be used by the callback receiver to ensure the delivery comes from BTCPay Server. BTCPay Server includes the `BTCPay-Sig` HTTP header, whose format is `sha256=HMAC256(UTF8(webhook's secret), body)`. The pattern to authenticate the webhook is similar to [how to secure webhooks in Github](https://docs.github.com/webhooks/securing/). If left out, null, or empty, the secret will not be changed.

enabled.description: Whether this webhook is enabled or not

automaticRedelivery.description: If true, BTCPay Server will retry to redeliver any failed delivery after 10 seconds, 1 minutes and up to 6 times after 10 minutes.

url.description: The endpoint where BTCPay Server will make the POST request with the webhook body

authorizedEvents.description: Which event should be received by this endpoint

everything.description: If true, the endpoint will receive all events related to the store.

specificEvents.description: If `everything` is false, the specific events that the endpoint is interested in. Current events are: `InvoiceCreated`, `InvoiceReceivedPayment`, `InvoiceProcessing`, `InvoiceExpired`, `InvoiceSettled`, `InvoiceInvalid`.

deliveryId.description: The delivery id of the webhook

originalDeliveryId.description: If this delivery is a redelivery, the is the delivery id of the original delivery.

isRedelivery.description: True if this delivery is a redelivery

type.description: The type of this event, current available are `InvoiceCreated`, `InvoiceReceivedPayment`, `InvoiceProcessing`, `InvoiceExpired`, `InvoiceSettled`, `InvoiceInvalid`, and `InvoicePaymentSettled`.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when this delivery has been created

storeId.description: The store id of the invoice's event

invoiceId.description: The invoice id of the invoice's event

metadata.description: User-supplied metadata added to the invoice at the time of its creation

manuallyMarked.description: Whether the invoice have been manually marked as confirmed

overPaid.description: Whether this invoice has received more money than expected

manuallyMarked.description: Whether the invoice have been manually marked as confirmed. If false, this invoice has received payments which could not confirm in time.

overPaid.description: Whether this invoice has received more money than expected

afterExpiration.description: Whether this payment has been sent after expiration of the invoice

paymentMethodId.description: What payment method was used for this payment

partiallyPaid.description: Whether the invoice received some payments before being expired.

post.description: A new invoice has been created
